job_details.degree_required: Degree in Computer Science, Statistics or relevant field

jd: From: Narsimha, gstachyon narsimha@gstachyon.com Reply to: narsimha@gstachyon.com Role:Java Full Stack DeveloperLocation:Austin Texas(Need Local)Position:RemoteExperience:15+ years Note : Candidates Must Previously Worked with Any of below State of Texas Agencies - At least 3-4 Years - No Other State Project Experience is Workable SKILLS:React.js, Oracle/SQL Server/MySQL, Snowflake, DevOps, AWS Amplify/Lambda, Amazon API Gateway experience JD :Proven experience as a Full Stack DeveloperCloud experience STRONGLY preferred.Proven front-end development experience STRONGLY preferred using HTML/CSS, Javascript, and React JS.Proven back-end development experience using Java STRONGLY preferred.Proven database development experience STRONGLY preferred using one or more relational databases such as Oracle, SQL Server, My SQL, Snowflake or similar.Dev Ops experience.Proven cloud web application development experience STRONGLY preferred, using AWS technologies such as AWS Amplify, AWS Lambda, Amazon API GatewayExcellent communication and teamwork skillsDegree in Computer Science, Statistics or relevant field.
